reviews.text: Tried the Press Grill for the first time this evening and it was by far one of the best places I've ever ate. The waitress Destiny was amazing. The food was...

Press Grill is a tried and true option in the Short North. They have late night eats and that's how I ended up there on my last visit.
The interior is small...
I love this place. We sometimes eat here on Sunday night, if we happen to be out in the area. The special on Sundays is a 10 ounce strip steak for $16. Add...
